gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core

Class CoreferenceChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.AbstractRelation
      • gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core.CoreferenceChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Relation, SemanticItem, java.lang.Comparable<SemanticItem>

    public class CoreferenceChain
extends AbstractRelation
    This class represents a coreference relation. Just like any other class that implements Relation interface, a coreference relation consists of a type (Anaphora, Cataphora, etc.) and a list of arguments with roles.

    This class also contains some utility methods to query coreference chains in a document.

    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • getAllSemtypes

        public java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> getAllSemtypes()
        Gets all semantic types associated with the coreference chain.

        It will return the semantic types of the mention arguments, if any, otherwise the type currently associated with the chain itself.

        Returns:
        the set of semantic types

      • getReferents

        public java.util.List<SemanticItem> getReferents()
        Gets all referents associated with the coreference chain.
        Returns:
        the list of referent semantic objects of this chain

        public java.util.List<SemanticItem> getExpressions()
        Gets all coreferential mentions associated with the coreference chain.
        Returns:
        the list of mentions in this chain

      • getChainsWithMention

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<CoreferenceChain> getChainsWithMention(SurfaceElement exp)
        Finds the coreference chains in which the given textual unit acts as the coreferential mention
        Parameters:
        exp - the mention textual unit
        Returns:
        a set of coreference chains meeting this criterion, or an empty set if no such chain is found

        Returns:

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<CoreferenceChain> getChainsWithTerm(SemanticItem sem)
        Finds all coreference chains in which the given semantic object.
        Parameters:
        sem - the semantic object in the coreference chain
        Returns:
        a set of coreference chains with the given term

      • getChainsWithTerm

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<CoreferenceChain> getChainsWithTerm(SemanticItem sem,
                                                                          java.lang.String role)
        Finds all coreference chains in which the given semantic object acts in the given role.
        Parameters:
        sem - the semantic object in the coreference chain
        role - the role of the semantic object
        Returns:
        a set of coreference chains meeting the criteria

      • getChainsWithAnaphor

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<CoreferenceChain> getChainsWithAnaphor(Term term)
        Finds the anaphora chains where the given term acts as the anaphor.
        Parameters:
        term - the coreferential term (anaphor)
        Returns:
        a set of anaphora chains with the term in anaphor role.

      • getChainWithAnaphor

        public static CoreferenceChain getChainWithAnaphor(Term term)
        Finds the anaphora chain that includes the given term as the anaphor.

        In case chains involving the term are not merged, it will return the first chain in the list of chains.

        Parameters:
        term - the anaphor term
        Returns:
        an anaphora chain involving the term in anaphor role.

      • interSentential

        public boolean interSentential()
        Determines whether this coreference chain is inter-sentential or not.
        Returns:
        true if the chain spans multiple sentences.
